title: Grave Watcher

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-  Watch the town from afar and take note of anyone who targets or interacts with dead players tonight.
-  Guard a player, protecting them with Powerful defense and preventing one visit on them. If the target is visited multiple times, prevent a random visit with the highest priority. This ability is regarded as having the highest possible priority. [Unlocked upon three Town deaths.]
-  Strike a target with a shovel. Deals a Basic attack if the target is non-Town, but will backfire and hit the Grave Watcher instead if their target is a Town member. [Unlocked upon two non-Town deaths.]

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-  Gain roleblock and conversion immunity. [Unlocked upon two total deaths.]
-  Gain a focused mind, able to multitask and self-target. [Unlocked upon four total deaths.]
-  Gain Basic defence. [Unlocked upon six total deaths.]
-  The Grave Watcherâ€™s vote now counts as three. [Unlocked upon eight total deaths.]
